comment: The set of complex numbers exists. This theorem shows that ~ ax-cnex is redundant if we assume ~ ax-rep . See also ~ ax-cnex . (Contributed by NM, 30-Jul-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jun-2013.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
